item.title: How to get and watch free TV
item.description: So I canceled directTV awhile back and have been struggling to figure out how to easily download the shows I want to watch. I would love to do it legally. I have looked into the itunes solution - but they don’t have all I need/want. And it won’t work for hiromi - in japan. So I needed something that wasn’t region specific and something that wasn’t hard. With these requirements I poked around quite a bit.
